name: KOReader Sync
description: Sync book reading progress with KOReader devices. Provides an API endpoint compatible with KOReader Progress Sync functionality, allowing users to sync their book reading progress between KOReader devices and Jellyfin.
overview: Sync book reading progress with KOReader

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- KOReader Progress Sync API implementation
- Jellyfin user authentication support
- Book matching via ISBN (placeholder)
- Conflict resolution (furthest progress wins)
- Thorough code documentation
